column2: This role is important to build the future of DSS and sustain its present programs. Currently, DSS has a strong foundational set up with a few municipal schools and private schools. This roles main aim is to strengthen the present school partnership programs such as First step forward, remedial class, reading promotion programs and you create, design and build new programs and relations with schools to ease the transition of children from informal educational setups to school curriculum.          Key responsibilities          - Sustain and improve current school partnership programs at DSS    - Design new programs to ease the movement of DSS children into municipal or private schools (    for example identify childrens pre-existing knowledge and map it with requirements of school    curriculums to create easy transitional processes)    - Identify difficulties, conduct on ground research and create systematic processes for partnerships    with municipal schools    - Build conversations and reliable bonds with municipal authorities for expanding DSS projects    - Map areas for expansion and create sustenance strategies for partnerships with municipal schools    - Co-ordinate, update and report to the COO/ director of DSS.          Mandatory pre-requisites include:          - 3-5 years work experience in the development sector, NGO or private education sector (includes    anyone from a CSR background)    - Past demonstrable networks or past scope of working experience with , for or along municipal    school authorities    - Strong interpersonal and communication skills    - Demonstrable ability to think strategically, creatively , innovatively and practically to ensure    achievement of desired outcomes    - Enthusiasm to build, design and sustain education programs bottom to top    - Excellent English written and oral communication skills ( Hindi and Marathi understanding    preferred)          Bonus points if you:          - Have previously worked with education based NGOs or Municipal authorities    - Have demonstrable experience in assisting , designing and implementing educational programs    created by/for municipal schools
column11: written and oral communication, presentation skills, problem solving, teaching, coordination, counselling, excel, critical thinking, recruitment, written communication, design, writing, leadership, decision making, school management, communication skills

column2: Groomify Salon is looking for Salon Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Staff Management: Hiring, training, supervising, and scheduling salon staff, including hairdressers, estheticians, nail technicians, and support staff      Client Relations: Ensuring excellent customer service, addressing client needs and complaints, and building long-term client relationships      Inventory Management: Managing salon inventory, including beauty products, tools, and equipment, and ordering supplies as needed      Financial Management: Overseeing the salon's financial operations, including budgeting, setting prices, and monitoring revenue and expenses      Salon Maintenance: Ensuring that the salon is clean, well-organized, and properly maintained      Promotions and Marketing: Developing and implementing marketing strategies and promotional activities to attract new clients and retain existing ones      Quality Control: Monitoring the quality of salon services and addressing any issues or improvements needed      Compliance: Ensuring that the salon complies with health and safety regulations and licensing requirements
column11: beautician activities, team management, staff management, customer management, customer service, hair care, store operations, sales, retail, marketing, financial management, hair styling, store management, inventory management, customer handling

column2: Mango Meadows agricultural pleasure land pvt ltd  is looking for FARM MANAGER  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Delegating responsibilities and supervising business operations      Hiring, training, motivating and coaching employees as they provide attentive, efficient service to customers, assessing employee performance and providing helpful feedback and training opportunities.      Resolving conflicts or complaints from customers and employees.      Monitoring store activity and ensuring it is properly provisioned and staffed.      Analyzing information and processes and developing more effective or efficient processes and strategies.      Establishing and achieving business and profit objectives.      Maintaining a clean, tidy business, ensuring that signage and displays are attractive.      Generating reports and presenting information to upper-level managers or other parties.      Ensuring staff members follow company policies and procedures.      Other duties to ensure the overall health and success of the business.

Sudit K. Parekh & Co. is looking for EXECUTIVE - ATTEST to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As an Executive specializing in Attestation, you will play a vital role in ensuring the accuracy, integrity, and compliance of financial statements and reports for our clients      Working closely with senior management and engagement teams, you will execute various attest engagements, including audits, reviews, and compilations      Your attention to detail, analytical skills, and understanding of accounting principles will contribute to the successful completion of engagements and the delivery of high-quality service to our clients        Responsibilities:        Engagement Execution: Execute attest engagements, including audits, reviews, and compilations, in accordance with professional standards and regulatory requirements      Financial Analysis: Conduct detailed analysis of financial statements, transactions, and accounting records to assess accuracy, completeness, and compliance with accounting principles      Workpaper Preparation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive workpapers documenting audit procedures, findings, and conclusions, ensuring adherence to firm standards and quality requirements      Client Interaction: Interact with clients to gather information, address inquiries, and facilitate the completion of audit procedures, maintaining professionalism and client confidentiality at all times      Team Collaboration: Collaborate with engagement teams and senior management to plan and execute engagements effectively, sharing insights, and contributing to problem-solving and decision-making processes      Quality Assurance: Assist in the review and evaluation of workpapers, reports, and deliverables produced by the engagement team, identifying areas for improvement and ensuring compliance with firm policies and procedures      Regulatory Compliance: Stay informed about changes in accounting standards, regulations, and industry trends, applying knowledge to engagements and providing guidance to team members as needed      Professional Development: Pursue opportunities for continuous learning and professional growth, including participation in training programs, obtaining relevant certifications, and staying updated on industry best practices
column11: financial analysis, accounts payable, sap, welding, quality control, sap fi, documentation, auditing, mig, mig welding, accounting, analysis, assurance, quality analysis, qc, arc, compliance, quality assurance, fi-ar, arc welding, sap fico, finance, financial statements

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION  Maintenance / Operations ??Review of critical and non-critical calls with internal team & Vendor (HVAC, DG, Refrigeration, MEPC, STP, WTP, Elevator & Escalator, House Keeping and Pest Control). ??Timely completion of Hand Over Take Over of New Stores and Refresh Stores. ??Execute Energy saving ideas & monitor consistently across stores within scope. ??Ensure that the vendor technicians and HK staffs are trained at regular. ??Ensure timely payments / billing of all vendors and Ensure proper vendor data base and back up for critical vendors. ??Routine inspections & maintenance of all electrical distribution boards and panels. ??Maintenance of Precision AC units for server room, operation & maintenance of UPS, Routine interiors repairs & painting jobs, Carpentry & plumbing services. ??Ensuring 100% uptime of all equipments like, Audio Visual equipment, LCD projectors and motorized screens, paper Shredders, Kitchen equipment?? like, microwave ovens, refrigerators, tea/coffee machines, dishwashers, office furniture etc. ??Responsible for spare parts planning, Demanding, Stocking & Optimum Utilization. ??Making of daily reports, keeping records & responsible for all types of problem related to given sites. ??AMC for all equipment like UPS, Precision AC & also for fire system, CCTV, Access Control system. Facility Management Responsibilities ??Adherence to Planned preventive maintenance (PPM) program to ensure all equipment?? in good working order. It included 52 week maintenance planner, preventive maintenance procedure, log books, checklists, work instructions, incident report, History cards, ??Energy conservation and utilities management. ??Monitoring consumption levels. ??Handling back office operations for establishing new systems and Quality improvement processes in the office ensuring compliance to the same. ??Interacting with different departments for executing the maintenance of all equipment in the organization and enhancing the overall efficiency. ??Effective Planning & execution of Emergency Escape Routes, Fire Fighting & Breakdown Emergencies. ??Developing a vendor base for cost effective procurement of material and negotiating AMC??/renewal of lease for maintenance of engineering equipment??. ??Conducting training sessions to the line functions for effective handling machineries maintenance & operation, Personnel Safety, etc. ??Conducts Fire Evacuation Drill as per NBC norms. ??Team Handling and Vendor Management. ??Ensuring optimum and effective utilization of funds in providing congenial work environment and basic amenities in the work premises. ??Ensuring maintenance of optimum inventory levels in the Stores and maintaining business relations with vendors for the procurement of necessary items for the office. ??Managing Automatic fire detection, alarm & extinguishing systems, Fire suppression system. Hydraulic systems, HAVAC Systems, PA System, UPS System, BMS System, CCTV & Access Control System, WLD. ??Effective implementation of Planned Preventive & Conditioning Based Predictive Maintenance. ??Conducting Operational Readiness Inspections, Pre & Post Refit Trials of Engines & Auxiliary Machineries to assess the condition before & after overhauls. ??Conducting enquiries, investigation of machinery failures and implementing corrective action procedures. ??Supervising Piping, Ventilation, Air Treatment Units and Exhaust on systems. ??52 week PPM plan for all critical equipment??. ??Handled Air Conditioning & Refrigeration plants (Central & split). ??Managed Electromechanical equipment like paper shredder machine, projectors etc. ??Handled operation and maintenance of UPS system, Invertor and PAC.
column11: Facility Operations, technical operations, Property Management, Facility Administration, Plumbing, Soft Services, DG Sets, Building Construction, Lifts, Facility Services, Site Engineering
